title: 4 children were rescued after 40 days in the jungle. How did they survive?
description: The missing children, aged 13, 9, 4 and 1, were rescued 40 days after their plane crashed in the Amazon jungle in Colombia, killing all three adults on board.

title: Zelensky signals Ukraine’s counteroffensive is underway
description: The Ukrainian leader made the remarks at a news conference with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in Kyiv.

title: Political risks rise for Putin as Ukraine’s counteroffensive begins
description: The risks are rising for Vladimir Putin as Ukraine begins its much-awaited counteroffensive, with the Russian president acknowledging Kyiv’s “offensive potential.”

title: With Russia claiming Bakhmut, Ukraine tallies cost in lost lives and limbs
description: Five Ukrainian soldiers reflect on whether the battle for Bakhmut was worth the sacrifices they made.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Putin derides Ukrainian offensive as ‘failure’ as Kyiv reports small gains
description: Ukrainian officials said their forces had advanced less than a mile in Bakhmut, a day after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky hinted at gains near the town.

title: Ama Ata Aidoo, Ghanaian writer who was voice of African women, dies at 81
description: Ms. Aidoo's works explored the ghosts of the past such as colonialism and slavery.

title: Plane crash children found alive after 40 days in jungle, officials say
description: The siblings, aged 13 to 1, were traveling in a small aircraft that crashed in the Colombian Amazon on May 1. Their mother and two others were killed.
